## compareByKey() function

HOF comparator. Returns new comparator to sort objects by given `key` and with optional comparator `cmp` (default: [compare](./compare.compare.md)<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compareByKey<T, A extends Keys<T>>(a: A, cmp?: Comparator<Val1<T, A>>): Comparator<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>A</code> |  |
|  cmp | <code>Comparator&lt;Val1&lt;T, A&gt;&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Comparator<T>`
